app.title: Music Maker JAM: Beatmaker app
app.description:
Music Maker JAM: The music maker & beat maker free music app for all music creators, DJs and producers, whatever your level is. Music Maker JAM is an easy-to-use song maker: create or remix amazing music beats and tracks using loops from a variety of musical genres including Trap, EDM, Rap, Dubstep, Hip-Hop, House, Garage, Pop, Rock, and more.

Whether you‚Äôre an experienced beat maker or just exploring for the first time, this is the perfect way to make music!

‚ú® Our free beat maker features will give you the music studio experience:

‚Ä¢ Make music or remix music beats: Choose from over 300 Mix Packs with more than 500,000 loops.

‚Ä¢ Make it your style: Available musical genres include Trap, EDM, Rap, Hip-Hop, House, Pop, Rock, Dubstep, Jazz, Latin, Techno, Garage, DnB and many more - the possibilities are endless.

‚Ä¢ Be a music production pro: Record your tracks with a perfect mix on the 8-channel mixer, or just jam live for your friends at a party.

‚Ä¢ Be creative: Change tempo and harmonies, arrange song parts and play around with spectacular real-time effects like reverb, stutter, delay, and more.

‚Ä¢ Make beats and remix tracks by simply shaking your smartphone or tablet.

‚Ä¢ Sing or rap on your tracks: Record your voice and mix your vocals into your beats, then apply autotune effects for ultimate results, like a real trap beat maker.

‚Ä¢ Choose from all the instruments you could want - who needs a garage band!

‚Ä¢ Share your songs directly on YouTube, SoundCloud, Facebook, TikTok and other social networks.

‚Ä¢ Join our music community: Connect and become friends with artists, influencers, fans, followers, DJs, music producers and more.


Music Maker JAM is a user-friendly and free music app for DJs, beat makers, producers, or simply music lovers of all levels, beginners or pros. Make beats and create music with our song mixer - anytime and anywhere!

Our Music Maker JAM community has created and uploaded more than 10 million tracks. Join it now!

Get Music Maker JAM to create your own music and become a beat maker today. Unleash your creativity and your music production skills now.

‚ÑπÔ∏è MORE INFO ‚ÑπÔ∏è

app.summary: Beat maker, music maker, song maker‚Ä¶ you name it! Create music now.

reviews.text: Out of ALL the apps I have used making beats on for my songs I rap too. THIS IS THE BEST! It's easy to find sounds to put together it's all right their once you pick the sound packs you want to use. Easy to move through them. You can speed them slow them reverse the sounds and record loops of anything. So easy compared to every app I have ever used! Thank you! Music maker JAM! ‚ù§Ô∏è You make it possible for me to make music for the song I freestyle too! You beast mode for life. Pay me don't play me

I love this app, I love how you can use different (built in) riffs to create music, and I think it's an amazing alternative to Garageband, but on my phone, it doesn't like the images and has little glitches here and there. All in all, this is an amazing app, but it still needs a little more work. PS: I would add more ways to get beatcoins on there.

The app is great! I love how it allows you to completely customize and make your own loops. The reason I gave this 3 stars instead of 5 is because of the coins. When I first got the app it was great because I would constantly get rewarded with coins. The coins buy you soundpacks. But unfortunately now that I'm using this app all the time i don't get any coins anymore:( total bummer, love this app but need coins in order to make new sounds.

This app is fairly decent but I only have one complaint. Sometimes when transitioning to the different blue square on the top while mixing (ex: A, A(1), A(2)) the loop will cut off and make a sharp static-like noise, which seems to ruin the project as a whole. I've been using this app for a couple years now and never noticed this issue. So in conclusion, it'd be nice to see this sound issue resolved that's how I can change this to 5 stars. Thanks!

I haven't paid for the pro version (yet, I might) but the free version is pretty nice. Decent choices, obviously more with pro version. Luckily tho, this isn't a "trial version to be able to even test anything and hope you forget about your subscription." This app is straight forward. You start free. You can upgrade if you want. Best to give this app a go, see if you feel it is worth your money. Maybe the UI isn't for you, but it's best to try it first. As I said, really not bad, even as free.

Downloaded the update and it's been acting weird. Despite saving my work (I'm constantly saving my work on this every so often, by the way), I would later come back to everything I've saved and find certain volume levels higher or lower. In some cases with the volume level being lowered all the way and turned off, I'll still hear sound with the playback as I'm recording in instances in which that it shouldn't occur at all!
reviews.replyText:
Hi Chance,

Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you are encountering an issue with the volume levels in your projects. Simply email us at support@loudly.com and we‚Äôd be happy to help you resolve the issue.

Your MMJ team

reviews.text: I've had this app for awhile now. When it comes to rating apps I seldom do, but I had to for this! It's fun and handy in making your own music, my only complaint is I've yet to find any packs that were "peaceful", as in all the instruments have been quite intense, there's no gentle/"lighthearted" ones. I've recently ran into a problem trying to log into my account on my new phone, but the support team was fast, friendly and helpful! 4/5 Stars. Cons: all packs feel intense & can't update email.

I absolutely love the app - how it lets you create music easily, with many harmonies and melodies and tracks to choose from. I love how you can record your own music and add it in to your songs, and how you can adjust each part's volume and everything! The one and only problem I have is that the songs I've already made and saved to my account aren't able to be automatically transferred when I switch devices. I had to redo my favorite songs all the way just to transfer them between devices. I don't tend to upload a lot of my songs, but I would REALLY appreciate it if my songs could automatically transfer between devices when linked to my account. I feel that I've lost a lot of my good projects because of this. Please fix and I'll give this app the 5 stars it really deserves!

At first I did not like this app because it did not look like the other daws. So I tried most of the other daws. My biggest issue was they tried too hard to mirror a desktop DAW. Doesn't work out good on a cramped phone screen lol. So I came back to this one. It's so much easier on Music Maker Jam! Same great features and NO CRAMPED screen! Love it!

The BEST music making app hands down! There are so many free options without any slowing down, or irritating ads. The Loudly team(app creators/techs) are promptly attentive to any issues which do not happen often. The MMJ team are creative, witty, and so intuned with the user's needs. You can save and share any tracks with multiple places like instagram, youtube, etc which opens up even more options for collaboration, and more. If you get this app you won't be disappointed!

app.recentChanges:
* Tutorial 5
* New login layout
* No authorizations required for microphone and files at startup
* Physics of BPM control corrected
* Loading projects is more error-tolerant
* Various minor improvements and bug fixes
app.AIReview:
Music Maker JAM Review ‚Äì A Solid Free Beatmaking App

Overview

Music Maker JAM has rapidly become one of the most downloaded music creation apps available, boasting over 32 million installs and a robust 4.5-star rating. Developed as a free beatmaker app targeting both novice and experienced musicians, it aims to democratize music production by offering a surprisingly comprehensive suite of tools within a user-friendly interface. The core premise ‚Äì allowing users to create or remix tracks using loops across diverse genres ‚Äì is fundamentally sound and has clearly resonated with a large audience. The app‚Äôs success suggests a genuine need for accessible music creation tools, particularly amongst younger demographics drawn to electronic genres like Trap, EDM, and Hip-Hop. However, the sheer volume of downloads also raises questions about long-term support, monetization strategies (despite being free), and potential scalability issues.

Key Features

Music Maker JAM is packed with features designed to facilitate a surprisingly deep level of musical creation. The core functionality revolves around:

  • Loop Library: A massive collection of loops categorized by genre ‚Äì Trap, EDM, Rap, Dubstep, Hip-Hop, House, Garage, Pop, Rock, and many more. This library forms the bedrock of the app‚Äôs creative possibilities.
  • Beat Sequencer: A visual sequencer allows users to arrange loops, adding effects and customizing rhythms. The interface is designed for intuitive drag-and-drop operation.
  • Effect Plugins: A selection of built-in effect plugins ‚Äì including reverb, delay, chorus, distortion, and EQ ‚Äì enables shaping the sound of individual loops and entire tracks.
  • Instrument Library: A collection of virtual instruments (synthesizers, drums, etc.) are included to provide a broader sonic palette for users.
  • Song Export: Users can export their creations in various formats including MP3 and WAV.
  • Remix Mode: This allows users to take existing tracks within the app‚Äôs library and modify them ‚Äì essentially creating remixes on the fly.

Strengths

  • Accessibility for Beginners: The intuitive interface and simplified workflow make Music Maker JAM remarkably easy to learn, even for complete beginners with no prior music production experience. The visual sequencer is particularly effective in this regard.
  • Vast Loop Library: The sheer size of the loop library is a significant strength. With loops spanning virtually every popular genre, users have an enormous starting point for creating tracks. The categorization is reasonably well-structured, though improvements to search functionality would be beneficial.
  • Free Functionality: The app‚Äôs core features are entirely free, removing a major barrier to entry for aspiring musicians who may not want to invest in expensive production software initially.
  • Active Community (Based on Reviews): The high rating suggests a thriving community of users sharing tips, tutorials, and creations ‚Äì fostering collaboration and learning.

Areas for Improvement

  • Interface Clutter: While generally user-friendly, the interface can feel somewhat cluttered with options, particularly when multiple effects and instruments are applied to a track. A simplified "beginner mode" could significantly reduce this complexity.
  • Loop Quality Variation: The quality of loops within the library varies considerably. Some loops sound polished and professional, while others exhibit noticeable artifacts or lack detail. More rigorous curation would elevate the overall experience.
  • Search Functionality: The search functionality is currently limited and doesn't always return relevant results, especially when searching for specific sounds or patterns within the large loop library. Improved algorithms and keyword suggestions are needed.
  • Limited Advanced Features: While suitable for beginners, experienced beatmakers may find the app lacking in advanced features such as automation, complex MIDI sequencing capabilities, and more sophisticated effects options.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive, particularly for newcomers to music production. The drag-and-drop sequencer is easy to grasp, allowing users to quickly build basic beats. However, navigating the vast loop library can be overwhelming at first. Tutorials within the app are helpful but could benefit from more detailed walkthroughs of specific workflows. The app's performance ‚Äì particularly with larger projects and multiple effects applied ‚Äì occasionally suffers from minor lag, suggesting potential optimization needs.

Value for Money

As a free app, Music Maker JAM offers exceptional value. The breadth of features and the size of the loop library provide a surprisingly robust music creation experience without any financial commitment. The developers clearly aim to monetize through in-app purchases (e.g., premium loops, instruments, effects), but the core functionality remains entirely accessible for free ‚Äì a smart strategy for attracting a large user base.

Conclusion

Music Maker JAM is an excellent entry point into the world of music production. Its intuitive interface, extensive loop library, and complete lack of cost make it a standout free beatmaker app. While there are areas for improvement, particularly regarding interface clutter and search functionality, the app‚Äôs strengths ‚Äì accessibility and breadth ‚Äì outweigh its weaknesses. For anyone curious about creating electronic music or experimenting with beats, Music Maker JAM is highly recommended. It's a powerful tool that can spark creativity and provide a foundation for developing musical skills. Given its popularity and ongoing development (as evidenced by updates), it's likely to remain a relevant player in the mobile music creation landscape for years to come.
